text: The Progressive Conservative Party of Canada (PC; ) was a centre-right political party in Canada. It existed from 1942 to 2003.The Essentials of Canadian History: Pre-colonization to 1867-the Beginning ... – Terence Allan Crowley, Rae Murphy – Google Boeken. Books.google.com. Retrieved on April 12, 2014. Only four members of this party became Prime Ministers of Canada (John Diefenbaker, Joe Clark, Brian Mulroney and Kim Campbell). Peter MacKay was the party's last leader. ==References== Category:1942 establishments in Canada Category:Political parties in Canada Category:Political parties based in Ottawa
title: Progressive Conservative Party of Canada
